funFacts: Baybayin is an ancient pre-colonial Philippine script that was used before Spanish colonization.
Some translators incorporate various historical character variants, which sometimes leads to heated discussions about authenticity.
There is a growing cultural movement to revive Baybayin as a symbol of Filipino identity and heritage.
